companyInfo.Competitors: Sutter Health, One Medical, The Palo Alto Medical Foundation

jobDescription: ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS:Work in conjunction with IT to ensure health plan encounter data meet industry and individual health plan requirementsAnalyzes and interprets encounter data to identify potential issues and trends; Ensure compliance with regulatory bodiesMonitor daily administrative duties of Encounter Data. This includes direct response to internal and external customers’ issues ensuring resolutionDevelops encounter data high level workflows, including process by individual line of business.QUALIFICATIONS & REQUIREMENTS:Strong written and oral communication skills; Ability to clarify policies and proceduresAbility to work independently, organize and prioritize workEDUCATION AND/OR TRAINING:Bachelor’s degree in Business, Information Systems or other related field preferredMinimum of four (4) years’ experience in operations, data analysis or information management in insurance and/or delivery systems in the healthcare industry is strongly preferredMinimum of two (2) years analytical experience in a support role preferredSKILLS AND ABILITIES:Must have knowledge of healthcare administrative functions, including claims processing, remittance advice processing, eligibility and verificationsIn-depth knowledge of X 12 EDI formats and structures, EDI technology options and EDI data exchange implementation, CAQH regulations, core requirements and trading partner management oversightUnderstanding of CMS Risk Adjustment & HCC Methodology preferredCurrent and progressive healthcare experience in both provider and payer domainsMust have Government billing regulations experience including; Medicare, Medicare managed care, and medical terminologyExcellent analytical and problem-solving skillsStrong database and Microsoft Office skills including creating and maintaining spreadsheets
